thread.section_title: Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superstar of a resturant manager
thread.title_full: Superstar of a resturant manager - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Stephen D
title: Superstar of a resturant manager
text:
Day two of our three day trip to Xenia. Hotel is hip, well designed and killer location...room size is meh but you can forgive given location. Have to say our trip has been made so far by our super friendly French friend who runs the resturant.
Always smiling, always curious...attentive genuine service. A credit to autograph collection and the marriot group. Bravo!
